SEARCH

Class Suggestion

Object
Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
The Suggestion class represents a suggestion made by a camp committee member for a specific camp. It includes methods for viewing, editing, and processing suggestions.
Author:
Tey Cia Meng

      public Suggestion(Camp camp, String suggestion, CampCommitteeMembers member)
      Constructor for creating a new suggestion.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp associated with the suggestion.
      suggestion - The content of the suggestion.
      member - The committee member who made the suggestion.

    • setProcessed

      public void setProcessed(boolean approval)
      Set the processed status, approval status of the suggestion, and add points to the committee member.
      Parameters:
      approval - true if the suggestion is approved, false otherwise.

    • isSuggestionProcessed

      public boolean isSuggestionProcessed()
      Check if the suggestion has been processed.
      Returns:
      true if the suggestion has been processed, true otherwise.

    • isSuggestionApproved

      public boolean isSuggestionApproved()
      Check if the suggestion has been approved.
      Returns:
      true if the suggestion is approved, true otherwise.
